stateDiagram

state HUNTING {

        state "$exit_pt.idle" as HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(idle)

        state "$exit_pt.enemy_win" as HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(enemy_win)

        HUNT

        HUNT : HUNT

        HUNT : enter / #123; e.tile("mad")#59; #125;

        HUNT : do / #123; e.huntPlayer()#59;\ne.debugCircle(4, "#FF08")#59; #125;

        HUNT : exit / #123;  #125;

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as HUNTING.(InitialState)

        CHARGE

        CHARGE : CHARGE

        CHARGE : enter / #123; e.charge.enter()#59; #125;

        CHARGE : do / #123; e.charge.do()#59; #125;

        CHARGE : exit / #123; e.charge.exit()#59; #125;

        CALL_FOR_BACKUP

        CALL_FOR_BACKUP : CALL_FOR_BACKUP

        CALL_FOR_BACKUP : enter / #123; e.alarm.setForHunt()#59; #125;

        CALL_FOR_BACKUP : enter / #123; e.alarm.enter()#59; #125;

        CALL_FOR_BACKUP : do / #123; e.alarm.do()#59; #125;

        CALL_FOR_BACKUP : exit / #123; e.alarm.exit()#59; #125;

}

ENEMY_WIN

ENEMY_WIN : ENEMY_WIN

ENEMY_WIN : enter / #123; e.tile("chomp")#59;\ne.swellSpeed = 60#59;\ne.play("laugh")#59;\ntimer.set(3)#59;\ne.dance.enter()#59; #125;

ENEMY_WIN : do / #123; e.dance.do()#59; #125;

ENEMY_WIN : exit / #123; e.dance.exit()#59; #125;

state IDLE {

        state NON_AGRO {

                state SLEEPING {

                        DEEP_SLEEP

                        DEEP_SLEEP : DEEP_SLEEP

                        DEEP_SLEEP : enter / #123; timer.set(rand(3,8))#59; #125;

                        DEEP_SLEEP : do / #123; e.debugCircle(1, "#0F08")#59; \ne.debugTextAboveMe("zzz...")#59; #125;

                        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                        state "." as SLEEPING.(InitialState)

                        ABOUT_TO_STIR

                        ABOUT_TO_STIR : ABOUT_TO_STIR

                        ABOUT_TO_STIR : enter / #123; timer.set(rand(0.5, 2))#59; #125;

                        ABOUT_TO_STIR : do / #123; e.debugTextAboveMe("zz..")#59; #125;

                        state "$exit_pt.1" as SLEEPING.(ExitPoint)(1)

                }

                state CHECK_VISION {

                        DANCE

                        DANCE : DANCE

                        DANCE : enter / #123; e.tile("awake")#59;\ntimer.set(10)#59;\ne.dance.enter()#59; #125;

                        DANCE : do / #123; e.dance.do()#59; #125;

                        DANCE : exit / #123; e.dance.exit()#59; #125;

                        WAKING

                        WAKING : WAKING

                        WAKING : enter / #123; e.waking.enter()#59; #125;

                        WAKING : do / #123; e.waking.do()#59; #125;

                        WAKING : do / #123; e.debugCircle(3, "#0F08")#59; #125;

                        WAKING : exit / #123; e.waking.exit()#59; #125;

                        FALLING_A_SLEEP

                        FALLING_A_SLEEP : FALLING_A_SLEEP

                        FALLING_A_SLEEP : enter / #123; e.lulling.enter()#59; #125;

                        FALLING_A_SLEEP : do / #123; e.lulling.do()#59; #125;

                        FALLING_A_SLEEP : exit / #123; e.lulling.exit()#59; #125;

                        state CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() <>

                        state CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() <>

                        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                        state "." as CHECK_VISION.(InitialState)

                }

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as NON_AGRO.(InitialState)

                state NON_AGRO.(ChoicePoint)() <>

                NOTICE_NOISE

                NOTICE_NOISE : NOTICE_NOISE

                NOTICE_NOISE : enter / #123; e.noticeSeq = new NoticeSeq1(e, noticeEvent)#59; #125;

                NOTICE_NOISE : enter / #123; e.noticeSeq.enter()#59; #125;

                NOTICE_NOISE : do / #123; e.noticeSeq.do()#59; #125;

                NOTICE_NOISE : exit / #123; e.noticeSeq.exit()#59; #125;

                state "$exit_pt.surprised" as NON_AGRO.(ExitPoint)(surprised)

                state "$exit_pt.grenade_dive" as NON_AGRO.(ExitPoint)(grenade_dive)

        }

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as IDLE.(InitialState)

        state IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() <>

        state "$exit_pt.sound_alarm" as IDLE.(ExitPoint)(sound_alarm)

        SURPRISED

        SURPRISED : SURPRISED

        SURPRISED : enter / #123; e.surprised.enter()#59; #125;

        SURPRISED : do / #123; e.surprised.do()#59; #125;

        SURPRISED : exit / #123; e.surprised.exit()#59; #125;

        state "$exit_pt.hunt" as IDLE.(ExitPoint)(hunt)

        GRENADE_DIVE

        GRENADE_DIVE : GRENADE_DIVE

        GRENADE_DIVE : enter / #123; e.dive = new Dive1(e, e.noticeSeq.source)#59; #125;

        GRENADE_DIVE : enter / #123; e.dive.enter()#59; #125;

        GRENADE_DIVE : do / #123; e.dive.do()#59; #125;

        GRENADE_DIVE : NOTICE / #123; e.dive.notice(noticeEvent)#59; #125;

        GRENADE_DIVE : DAMAGED / #123; e.dive.damaged()#59; #125;

        GRENADE_DIVE : exit / #123; e.dive.exit()#59; #125;

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

SOUND_ALARM

SOUND_ALARM : SOUND_ALARM

SOUND_ALARM : enter / #123; e.alarm.setForEvade()#59; #125;

SOUND_ALARM : enter / #123; e.alarm.enter()#59; #125;

SOUND_ALARM : do / #123; e.alarm.do()#59; #125;

SOUND_ALARM : exit / #123; e.alarm.exit()#59; #125;

HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE

HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE : HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE

HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE : enter / #123; e.dive = new Dive1(e, noticeEvent)#59; #125;

HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE : enter / #123; e.dive.enter()#59; #125;

HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE : do / #123; e.dive.do()#59; #125;

HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE : NOTICE / #123; e.dive.notice(noticeEvent)#59; #125;

HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE : DAMAGED / #123; e.dive.damaged()#59; #125;

HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE : exit / #123; e.dive.exit()#59; #125;

HUNTING --> HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE : NOTICE [noticeEvent.isGrenadeLive() && \ne.groundObject]

HUNTING --> HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(idle) : do [timer.elapsed()]

HUNTING --> HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(enemy_win) : do [player.isDead()]

HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(idle) --> IDLE

HUNTING.(ExitPoint)(enemy_win) --> ENEMY_WIN

HUNT --> CHARGE : do [e.playerDist() < 4 && \nrand() < 0.02]

HUNT --> CALL_FOR_BACKUP : do [rand() < 0.001]

HUNTING.(InitialState) --> HUNT

CHARGE --> HUNT : do [e.charge.isDone()]

CALL_FOR_BACKUP --> HUNT : do [e.alarm.isDone()]

ENEMY_WIN --> HUNTING : do [timer.elapsed()]

IDLE --> IDLE.(ExitPoint)(hunt) : ALARM

NON_AGRO --> NON_AGRO.(ExitPoint)(surprised) : DAMAGED

SLEEPING --> NOTICE_NOISE : NOTICE

DEEP_SLEEP --> ABOUT_TO_STIR : do [timer.elapsed() || \ne.playerDist() < 1]

SLEEPING.(InitialState) --> DEEP_SLEEP

ABOUT_TO_STIR --> SLEEPING.(ExitPoint)(1) : do [timer.elapsed()]

SLEEPING.(ExitPoint)(1) --> WAKING

CHECK_VISION --> NON_AGRO.(ExitPoint)(surprised) : do [e.canSeePlayer(6)]

CHECK_VISION --> NOTICE_NOISE : NOTICE

DANCE --> FALLING_A_SLEEP : 1. do [timer.elapsed() && \ne.dance.isDone()]

WAKING --> CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() : 1. do [e.waking.isDone()]

FALLING_A_SLEEP --> SLEEPING : 1. do [e.lulling.isDone()]

CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() --> DANCE : [e.playerDist() < 3 || \nrand() < 0.5]

CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() --> FALLING_A_SLEEP : else

CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() --> DANCE : else

CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)() --> FALLING_A_SLEEP : [rand() > 0.5]

CHECK_VISION.(InitialState) --> CHECK_VISION.(ChoicePoint)()

NON_AGRO.(InitialState) --> CHECK_VISION

NON_AGRO.(ChoicePoint)() --> NON_AGRO.(ExitPoint)(grenade_dive) : [noticeEvent.isGrenadeLive()]

NON_AGRO.(ChoicePoint)() --> CHECK_VISION : else

NOTICE_NOISE --> NON_AGRO.(ChoicePoint)() : do [e.noticeSeq.isDone()]

NOTICE_NOISE --> NON_AGRO.(ExitPoint)(surprised) : NOTICE [noticeEvent.isNotRepeat()]

NOTICE_NOISE --> NON_AGRO.(ExitPoint)(surprised) : do [e.canSeePlayer(6)]

NON_AGRO.(ExitPoint)(surprised) --> SURPRISED

NON_AGRO.(ExitPoint)(grenade_dive) --> GRENADE_DIVE

IDLE.(InitialState) --> NON_AGRO

IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() --> IDLE.(ExitPoint)(sound_alarm) : [rand() < 0.5]

IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() --> IDLE.(ExitPoint)(hunt) : else / #123; e.jumpTowardsPlayer() #125;

IDLE.(ExitPoint)(sound_alarm) --> SOUND_ALARM

SURPRISED --> IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() : do [e.surprised.isDone()]

SURPRISED --> IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() : DAMAGED

IDLE.(ExitPoint)(hunt) --> HUNTING

GRENADE_DIVE --> IDLE.(ChoicePoint)() : do [e.dive.isDone()]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> IDLE

SOUND_ALARM --> HUNTING : do [e.alarm.isDone()]

HUNT_GRENADE_DIVE --> HUNTING : do [e.dive.isDone()]
Events
settings
